mapper.select: select tab.owner, tab.table_name, cols.column_name , cols.data_type, cols.data_length, cols.data_precision, cols.data_scale, case cols.nullable when 'Y' then 1 else 0 end as nullable , cols.column_id, cc.position, tcom.comments as table_comments, ccom.comments as column_comments from DBA_TABLES tab left join dba_constraints cons on tab.owner = cons.owner and tab.table_name = cons.table_name and cons.constraint_type = 'P' inner join dba_tab_columns cols on tab.owner = cols.owner and tab.table_name = cols.table_name left join dba_cons_columns cc on cons.owner = cc.owner and cons.table_name = cc.table_name and cons.constraint_name = cc.constraint_name and cols.column_name = cc.column_name left join dba_tab_comments tcom on cols.owner = tcom.owner and cols.table_name = tcom.table_name left join dba_col_comments ccom on cols.owner = ccom.owner and cols.table_name = ccom.table_name and cols.column_name = ccom.column_name where ( ( cols.owner = upper('ORGI') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('ORGI_ENDERECO_COMPLEMENTO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_BAIRRO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_BEM')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_CIDADE')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_CONTATO_PESSOA')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_COR_PELE')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_ENDERECO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_ENDERECO_PESSOA')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_ESCOLARIDADE')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_ESTADO_CIVIL')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_FAIXA_RENDA')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_NACIONALIDADE')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_OBJETOS_ANEXOS')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_PESSOA_FISICA')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_PESSOA_JURIDICA')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_PESSOA_DOCUMENTO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_PESSOA_TP_DOCUMENT')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_PROFISSAO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_RENDA_BENEFICIO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_TP_BEM')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_TP_CONTATO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_TP_ENDERECO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_TP_LOGRADOURO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_TP_MORADIA')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_TP_OBJETO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_TP_PESSOA_JURIDICA')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('CORP') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('CORP_UF')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_CONTRL_ENVIO_COMUNICACAO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_DIAGNOSTICO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_DIAGNOSTICO_INTERNACAO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_EQUIPE')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_FREQUENCIA_VISITA')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_INSTITUICAO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_INSTITUICAO_DISPOSITIVO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_MOTIVO_CONTINUIDADE')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_MOTIVO_INTERNACAO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_MOTIVO_REGISTRO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_MOVIMENTACAO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_NATUREZA_JURIDICA')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_ORGAO_ATRIBUICAO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_ORGAO_BAIRRO_ATUACAO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_ORIENTACAO_EQUIPE')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_ORIENT_EQUIPE_INTERNACAO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_PACIENTE')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_PAPEL_EQUIPE')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_PARAMETRO_SISTEMA')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_REFERENCIA_FAMILIAR')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_REF_MORADIA')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_SITUACAO_JURIDICA')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_TP_DISPOSITIVO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_TP_INSTITUICAO')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_TP_PLANO_SAUDE')) OR ( cols.owner = upper('NMSM') AND cols.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_TP_RELACIONAM_PACIENTE')) ) and (tab.table_name not like 'VW_%') and (tab.table_name not like 'BIN$%') and (tab.table_name not like 'AD$%') order by cols.table_name, cc.position, cols.column_id

select k.constraint_name, k.table_name, c.column_name, k.constraint_type , r.table_name as R_TABLE_NAME, cr.column_name r_column_name, extractvalue (dbms_xmlgen.getxmltype ( 'select search_condition from user_constraints where table_name =''' || k.table_name || ''' and constraint_name = ''' || k.constraint_name || ''''), '//text()') as SEARCH_CONDITION from dba_constraints k left join dba_constraints r on k.r_owner = r.owner and k.r_constraint_name = r.constraint_name inner join dba_cons_columns c on k.owner = c.owner and k.constraint_name = c.constraint_name and c.table_name = k.table_name left join dba_cons_columns cr on r.owner = cr.owner and r.constraint_name = cr.constraint_name and r.table_name = cr.table_name and c.position = cr.position where ( ( k.owner = upper('ORGI') AND k.table_name = UPPER('ORGI_ENDERECO_COMPLEMENTO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_BAIRRO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_BEM')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_CIDADE')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_CONTATO_PESSOA')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_COR_PELE')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_ENDERECO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_ENDERECO_PESSOA')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_ESCOLARIDADE')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_ESTADO_CIVIL')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_FAIXA_RENDA')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_NACIONALIDADE')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_OBJETOS_ANEXOS')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_PESSOA_FISICA')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_PESSOA_JURIDICA')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_PESSOA_DOCUMENTO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_PESSOA_TP_DOCUMENT')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_PROFISSAO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_RENDA_BENEFICIO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_TP_BEM')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_TP_CONTATO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_TP_ENDERECO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_TP_LOGRADOURO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_TP_MORADIA')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_TP_OBJETO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_TP_PESSOA_JURIDICA')) OR ( k.owner = upper('CORP') AND k.table_name = UPPER('CORP_UF')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_CONTRL_ENVIO_COMUNICACAO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_DIAGNOSTICO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_DIAGNOSTICO_INTERNACAO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_EQUIPE')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_FREQUENCIA_VISITA')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_INSTITUICAO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_INSTITUICAO_DISPOSITIVO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_MOTIVO_CONTINUIDADE')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_MOTIVO_INTERNACAO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_MOTIVO_REGISTRO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_MOVIMENTACAO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_NATUREZA_JURIDICA')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_ORGAO_ATRIBUICAO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_ORGAO_BAIRRO_ATUACAO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_ORIENTACAO_EQUIPE')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_ORIENT_EQUIPE_INTERNACAO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_PACIENTE')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_PAPEL_EQUIPE')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_PARAMETRO_SISTEMA')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_REFERENCIA_FAMILIAR')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_REF_MORADIA')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_SITUACAO_JURIDICA')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_TP_DISPOSITIVO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_TP_INSTITUICAO')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_TP_PLANO_SAUDE')) OR ( k.owner = upper('NMSM') AND k.table_name = UPPER('NMSM_TP_RELACIONAM_PACIENTE')) ) and (k.table_name not like 'AD$%') and k.constraint_type not in ( 'P' ) order by k.table_name, r.table_name , c.position
